Name: team_must_have_scrum_master
Description: Team must have a Scrum Master

Name: product_owner_must_manage_backlog
Description: Product Owner must manage the Product Backlog

Name: sprint_must_have_goal
Description: Sprint must have a defined goal

Name: sprint_review_must_have_feedback
Description: Sprint Review must have feedback documentation

Name: development_snapshot_must_have_version
Description: Development Snapshot must have version number
